document_data.mainbody:
Glina was the student of Neverwinter Academy.
Glina was a wizard of Neverwinter Academy, who entertained herself with gossips. Despite her father, Jochris, being the headmaster of the Academy, she was Qaras enemy. When Qara burned the stables at the Academy and went off, Hetha and Glina tracked her to Sunken Flagon inn.
When the Kalach-Cha and the companions persuaded the City Watchmen to work with the thieves or stay with the Watch, they would encounter Qara trading insults with Hetha and Glina. The Kalach-Cha couldve resolved the matter, causing Hetha and Glina to walk away.
